body.description: Kick start your party with JBL signature sound and a dazzling LED light show all in 360 degrees. Our bold, IPX7 waterproof design shines bright and will keep the tunes flowing for up to 12 hours on a single charge. Tap the JBL Connect App to change the sound-responsive colors and patterns and connect with other JBL PartyBoost compatible speakers to make your party epic.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The All New JBL Pulse 4 Bluetooth speaker with Lighshow. Sound you can See.
JBL PULSE 4 What's New? New, High-Resolution 360-degree Light Show New PartyBoost Mode / New 360-degree Speaker Array
JBL PULSE 4 Light up the Night Pulse 4 shines through the night with an amazing, high-resolution 360-degree LED lightshow
JBL PULSE 4 Follow the Beat Everywhere Pulse 4 delivers JBL signature sound in every direction with its ingenious 360 degree speaker array.

JBL PULSE 4 Make a Splash with IPX7 Waterproof Design Bring your speakers anywhere. Pool party? Perfect. Sudden cloudburst? Covered. Bash on the beach? Pulse 4 is IPX7 waterproof up to three-feet deep for fearless outdoor entertainment
JBL PULSE 4 Dance the Night or Day Away Ready to get your groove on? Pulse 4 delivers up to 12 hours of party time on a single charge

Additional Features App Control Download the JBL Connect App to rule your party with ease. And visualize your music with a variety of light show themes or even customize your very own. Ready to tune out? Turn your speaker into an ambient light show whether your music is on or off. JBL PartyBoost PartyBoost allows you to pair two JBL PartyBoost-compatible speakers together for stereo sound or link multiple JBL PartyBoost-compatible speakers to truly pump up your party

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light show is amazing and sounds beautiful
reviews.reviewText: Every frequency is extended well with a lot of great details. Battery life is good. The only downside is heating up of LED after prolonged periods of use and sometimes the speaker hibernates and gets disfunctional and can't power off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars JBL sounds great !
reviews.reviewText: I use it to listen to music without headphones. It does great and sounds great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my son for Christmas....he loves it and uses it all of the time. It was easily connected to his phone, has great sound quality (can be be played extremely loud if wanted), and also looks really cool!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Its fun to stare at
reviews.reviewText: JBL hands down has the best sound quality for mobile speakers. the dancing lights make the experience a bit more fun

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The quality of this beauty is amazing. This thing makes me feel like I’m in another dimension especially at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like a lava lamp but better!
reviews.reviewText: The sound quality is amazing. It's solidly built even though it is covered in high-grade, thick transparent acrylic and rubberized ends. It's waterproof, and easy to clean. It is a bit heavy so you'll want to get a case if possible. It's also good to protect the clear plastic surround against scratches. It doesn't scratch easily, but I wouldn't recommend throwing it in a bag uncovered with objects hitting it. Battery length is great and charges fast. The JBL App can be a bit flaky but works 95% of the time. Pairing the speaker to another Pulse is super easy and sounds amazing. The only thing I would gripe about is the lack of a simplified rubber case to protect the really gorgeous acrylic surround. Nothing fancy, just a holder or something to help transport it. Other than that, the speaker is amazing. I liked it so much I bought 2.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful speaker with great sound!
reviews.reviewText: I have several JBL speakers, including the flip 4, flip 5, charge 4 and clip 4. They all have decent sound, I wanted this one for the lights. I found this at the Verizon store while upgrading my phone, but wanted controls on the speaker itself, so when I found this version in white with the controls I grabbed it. I love the control over the colors with the JBL app, although I think that the sound quality is a little diminished because the speaker has been moved to the top and bottom so the lights take center stage. My charge 4 definitely has better sound than this newer model.It lives in my bedroom so I can't speak to the waterproof factor, but overall I like the speaker - I just wish they would have included upgraded sound, especially at this price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this speaker!
reviews.reviewText: When my last bluetooth speaker died, I needed to get another and a friend of mine recommended this one. It's a bit pricey but hopefully it lasts longer than the last one. I went with this one because of the brand and they seem to stand behind their products. I like that the color changes with the volume level, and I really like that I can turn off the color if I want to. I think it has a good range of connectivity, and I like that it has the indicator on the back side to let you know when your charge is starting to get low. I definitely recommend this item. (Buy it when it's on sale if you can).

reviews.reviewerName: Robson Luiz de Teixeira de Oliveira
reviews.reviewText: Gostei muito da caixa. Um ótimo som e uma perfeita harmonia com o ambiente graças ao colorido das luzes.

Rapidamente, si la recomiendo. Si prefieres fidelidad en lugar de ruido esta es tu bocina.Ej. Una Megaboom se escucha más fuerte pero la Pulse 4 se escucha mejor. Los bajos son increibles, separa muy bien las frecuencias.En contra podría poner el precio, pero la bocina se siente de muy buena calidad, no le pide nada a una BOSE revolve. El peso si es bastante, no recomendaría traerla de allá para acá por que parece que si se puede dañar. La luz al principio es muy llamativa pero con el paso de los días ya ni siquiera le pones atención. Eso si, cuando tienes invitados en casa todos quieren verla cambiar de color y es super llamativa, todo mundo quiere agarrarla y la llenan de manchas de dedos. La batería es buena peeero obvio no dura lo que dice, pero nada diferente a otras. Dura menos que una charge 3 y mucho menos que las UE boom 2 y Megaboom.En fin lo pondría así; La Megaboom se escucha más fuerte, mucho más, pero la Pulse 4 tiene mucho mejor sonido. Pero la UE boom2 y la megaboom son muy resistentes, lo digo por experiencia, se me han caido varias veces y siguen trabajando como si nada.Otra cosa que me gusto es que es USB-C peeeero no trae cargador, ya sé que puedo usar el de mi celular, pero por el precio debería incluir un cargador y no nada más el cable. Ah y no puede usarse como altavoz así que no puedes contestar llamadas, ya sé que no es gran cosa, pero yo si lo he usado, he contestado llamadas desde la bocina como las UE Boom 2 sobre todo cuando tienes las manos mojadas o simplemente para que todos hablen con alguien que llama.

reviews.reviewTitle: Beautifully Made... Brings Out The Confidence In My Selection...
reviews.reviewText: Beautifully Made... Brings Out The Confidence In My Selection...
Buen sonido, volumen si le falta pero en todo lo demás se escucha de lujo!
